scripts.publish:docker: docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64,linux/arm64 -t cmdoss/walrus-upload-relay:main -t cmdoss/walrus-upload-relay:main-v1.41.0 --push .
scripts.sync:dockerhub-readme: node ../../scripts/sync-dockerhub-readme.mjs --repo cmdoss/walrus-upload-relay --readme ./README.md --short-description 'A customized upload relay for Walrus.'
